name: Project KR4X - 2.5D / AaYMix
description:
Project KR4X Has a 2.5D Feeling.

Not really a release, but this model is a Merge between some Models i like.

It's give a pretty interresting unique Fusion.

All images Are RAW, 0 Editing was done, So it's Base Model Power.

  • 2.5D Feeling.

  • Capable of Anime Style to Digital Art with Very colorful Scene.

  • Detailed Anime Style.

  • Don't Burn with Kl-F8-Anime2 Vae. (Good Colors).

  • Good at SFW & NFSW.

  • Proportions is not bad.

  • Work's Perfectly with my Lora's so probably with any other Lora's.

Hires.Fix is recommended: 0.4-0.5 - 4x-Anime Ultra Sharp / Latent Nearest Exact: 0.5-0.6.

Also all images are pratically prompts from Other Model's, like this You Can Compare Easily !

Try it for yourself & Leave a review if you appreciate it. :)
